      • getTxnNumber

        public String getTxnNumber(String txnType,
                           String vDate)
                    throws ParseException
        This API will return the transaction no for any type of txn. Input :Type,transaction date and connection Output :Transaction number in the format txnType+number+/+month+/+year
        Specified by:
        getTxnNumber in interface CommonMethodsI
        Throws:
        ParseException

      • getDivisionIdFromCode

        public Integer getDivisionIdFromCode(String divisionCode,
                                     Connection connection)
        This API will return the sub feild id when the boundary num is passed. We are ordering by id_bndry_type desc so that sub field value will come first.
